div.p: Description: The set of values found in the Coord Axis Code column of the Coordinate Axis table as maintained in the EPSG geodetic parameter dataset. These define the axis for coordinate systems for geographic coordinates.

title.value: European Petroleum Survey Group Geodetic Parameter Dataset Coordinate Reference System

name.value: International Association of Oil & Gas Producers

description.value: Description: The set of values found in the Coord Axis Code column of the Coordinate Axis table as maintained in the EPSG geodetic parameter dataset. These define the axis for coordinate systems for geographic coordinates.
